transliterationText:
(N)i-nu ilum bṣi-ru-um | šar iluA-nun-na-ki | iluEN.LIL | be-el ša-me-e u ir-ṣi-tim | ša-i-im | ši-ma-at mâtim | a-na iluMarduk | mâr+ri-eš-ti-im ša iluEN.KI | ilubêlu-ut | kiššat ni-ši(g) | i-ši-mu-šum | in I-gi-gi u-šar-be-u-šu | KA.DINGIR.RA.KI | šum-šu ṣi-ra-am bib-bi-u | in ki-ib-ra-tim | u-ša-te-ru-šu i-na li-ib-bbi-šu | šar-ru-tam dârî-tam | ša ki-ma ša-me-e | u ir-ṣi-tim | iš-da-ša šu-ur-šu-da | u-ki-in-bnu-šum | i-nu-mi-šu | Ḫa-am-mu-ra-bi | ru-ba-am na-’-dam | pa-li-iḫ ili bia-ti | mi-ša-ra-am | i-na ma-tim | a-na šu-bi-i-im ra-ga-am u ṣi-nam | a-na ḫu-ul-lu-bḳi-im | dan-nu-um | en-ša-am | a-na la ḫa-ba-bli-im ki-ma iluŠamaš | a-na SAG.GIG | wa-ṣi-e-im-ma | ma-tim | nu-wu-ri-im ilum | u iluEN-LIL | a-na ši-ir ni-ši | tu-ub-bi-im | šu-mi ib-bu-u Ḫa-am-mu-ra-bi | ri-i-a-um | ni-bi-it | iluEN.LIL ba-na-ku | mu-gam-me-ir nu-uḫ-ši-im | u tu-uḫ-di-im | mu-ša-ak-li-il | mi-im-ma šum-šu | ana EN.LIL.KI bDur-ilu-KI za-ni-nu-um | na-’-du-um | ša Ê.KUR | šarrum li-i-a-um | mu-te-ir aluNUN.KI a-na aš-ri-šu | mu-ub-bi-ib

šuluḫ Ê.ZU.AB | ti-i-ib | ki-ib-ra-at | ir-bi-tim mu-šar-be zi-ik-ru | KA.DINGIR.RA.KI | mu-ti-ib | li-ib-bi iluMarduk | be-li-šu ša ûmi-šu | iz-za-zu | a-na Esagila | zêr šar-ru-tim | ša iluEN.ZU ib-ni-u-šu | mu-na-aḫ-ḫi-iš | aluŠIŠ.AB.KI | wa-aš-ru-um | mu-uš-te-mi-ḳum ba-bil ḫegallim | a-na Ê.NER.NU.GAL | šar ta-ši-im-tim | še-mu iluŠamaš bdannim | mu-ki-in išid UD.KIB.NUN.KI | mu-ša-al-bi-iš | wa-ar-ki-im | gi-gu-ne-e b iluA.A | mu-ṣi-ir bît Ebabbarra | ša ki šu-ba-at bša-ma-i | ḳarradum ga-mi-il | UD.UNU.KI | mu-ud-di-iš Ebabbarra a-na iluŠamaš | ri-ṣi-šu | be-lum mu-ba-li-iṭ | UNU.KI | ša-ki-in me-e nu-uḫ-ši-im | a-na ni-ši-šu | mu-ul-li | ri-eš Eanna | mu-gam-me-ir ḫi-iz-bi-im | a-na iluAnu | u iluNanâ | ṣalûl ma-tim | mu-pa-aḫ-ḫi-ir ni-ši bsa-ap-ḫa-tim | ša NI.SI.IN.KI | mu-da-aḫ-ḫi-id | nu-uḫ-ši-im | bît Ê.GAL.MAḪ ušumgallum šar+alim | ta-li-im | iluZA.MA(L).MA(L) | mu-šar-ši-id | šu-ba-at alu bNER.KI mu-uš-ta-aš-ḫi-ir | me-li-im-mi | Ê.ME.TE.UR.SAG | mu-uš-te-iṣ-bi | pa-ar-zi bra-bu-u-tim ša iluNanâ | pa-ki-id bi-tim | ḪAR.SAG. kalâma | bît kisal na-ki-ri | ša nit-ra-ru-šu u-ša-ak-bši-du

ni-is-ma-zu | mu-ša-te-ir | aluTIG.GAB.A.KI | mu-ra-ab-bi-iš mi-im-ma šum-šu | a-na ŠID.LAM. | ri-mu-um | ka-at-ru-um | mu-na-ak-ki-ip bza-i-ri na-ra-am TU.TU | mu-ri-iš | aluBar-zi-ba.KI | na-’-du-um | la mu-up-pa-bar-ku-u-um a-na Ê.ZI.DA | i-lu šar+alim | mu-di igi-gal-im | mu-ša-ad-di-il | me-ri-eš-tim ša DIL.BAT.KI | mu-ga-ar-ri-in bkarê | a-na iluUraš(?) | ga-aš-ri-im | be-lum zi-ma-at ḫa-aṭ-ṭi-im | u a-gi-im | ša u-ša-ak-bli-lu-šu | e-ri-iš-tum | iluMA.MA mu-ki-in | u-zu-ra-tim | ša KIŠ.KI | mu-di-eš-ši | ma-ka-li bel-lu-tim a-na iluNIN.TU | mu-uš-ta-lum | gi-it-ma-lum | ša-i-im | mi-ri-tim u ma-aš-ki-tim | a-na ŠIR.PUR.LA.KI | u GIR.SU.KI | mu-ki-il | ni-in-da-bi-e ra-bu-tim | a-na Ê.L | mu-tam-me-iḫ a-a-bi | mi-gi-ir | te-li-tim mu-ša-ak-li-il | te-ri-tim | ša ṢA.RI.UNU.KI | mu-ḫa-ad-di | li-ib-bi GIŠ.DAR ru-bu-um el-lum | ša ni-iš ga-ti-šu | iluAdad i-du-u | mu-ne-iḫ | li-ib-bi iluAdad ku-ra-di-im | i-na aluIM.KI | mu-uš-ta-ak-bki-in | zi-ma-tim | i-na E.UD.GAL.GAL šarrum na-di-in | na-bi-iš-tim | a-na UD.NUN.KI | a-še-ir | bît E.MAḪ e-te-el šar+alim | ga-ba-al | la ma-ḫa-ri-im

šu i-ḳi-šu | na-ab-ša-tam | a-na alu bMAŠ.KAN.PA.AL.KI | mu-še-eš-ki nu-uḫ-ši-im | a-na ŠID.LAM | im-ḳum | mu-tab-bi-lum | šu ik-šu-du na-ga-ab ur-ši-im | mu-uš-pa-az-zi-ir | ni-ši MAL.AL.bKA.A.KI | in ka-ra-ši-im | mu-šar-ši-du šu-ba-ti-ši-in | in nu-uḫ-ši-in(=im) | a-na iluEN.KI | u iluDAM.GAL.NUN.NA | mu-šar-bu-u šar-ru-ti-šu | dârî-iš i-ši-mu | zi-bi el-lu-tim | a-ša-ri-id bšar+alim | mu-ka-an-ni-iš da-ad-mi | nâruUD.KIB.NUN.NA | ṣal-tum iluDa-gan | ba-ni-šu | šu ig-mi-lu ni-ši ME.RA.KI | u TU.TU.UL.KI | ru-bu-um | na-’-du-um | mu-na-wi-ir pa-ni iluNanâ | ša-ki-in ma-ka-li bel-lu-tim | a-na iluNIN.A.ZU | ša-ti-ib ni-ši-šu | in pu-uš-ki-im mu-ki-in-nu | iš-ki-ši-im | kir-bu-um | KA.DINGIR.RA.KI | šu-ul-ma-ni-iš rê’i ni-ši(g) | ša ip-še-tu-šu | e-li GIŠ.DAR ṭa-ba | mu-ki-in-ni GIŠ.DAR | i-na Ê.UL.MAŠ kir-bu-um | A.GA.NE.KI | ri-bi-tim | mu-še-bi ki-na-tim | mu-šu-še-ir bam-mi mu-te-ir | lamassi-šu | da-mi-iḳ-tim | a-na aluA.USAR.KI | mu-še-ib-bi bna-bi-ḫi šarrum ša i-na bNi-nu-a.KI | i-na E.MIŠ.MIŠ | u-šu-bi-u | me-e iluNanâ | na-’-du-um mu-uš-te-mi-ḳum | a-na ilâni rabûti | li-ib-li-ib-bi | ša Su-mu-la-ilu mâr+dannim ša iluSin-bmu-ba-li-iṭ

zêr+dârû-um | ša šar-ru-tim | šarrum dannum | iluŠamaš KA.DINGIR.RA.KI | mu-še-zi nu-ri-im | a-na ma-at | Šu-me-er-im | u Ak-ka-di-im šarrum mu-uš-te-beš-mi | ki-ib-ra-at | ar-ba-im | mi-gi-ir iluNanâ ba-na-ku | i-nu-ma iluMarduk | a-na šu-te-šu-ur bni-ši | mâtim u-si-im | šu-ḫu-zi-im | u-we-e-ra-an-ni ki-it-tam | u mi-ša-ra-am i-na pî ma-tim | aš-ku-un | ši-ir ni-ši bu-ṭi-ib i-nu-mi-šu
šum-ma a-wi-lum <sup>b</sup>a-wi-lam u-ub-bi-ir-ma ne-ir-tam e-li-šu id-di-ma la uk-ti-in-šu mu-ub-bi-ir-šu id-da-ak

šum-ma a-wi-lum ki-iš-bi e-li a-wi-lim <sup>b</sup>id-di-ma la uk-ti-in-šu ša e-li-šu ki-iš-bu na-du-u a-na <sup>ilu</sup>Nârim i-il-la-ak <sup>ilu</sup>Nâram i-ša-al-<sup>b</sup>li-a-am-ma šum-ma <sup>ilu</sup>Nârum ik-ta-ša-zu mu-ub-bi-ir-šu bî-zu i-tab-ba-al šum-ma a-wi-lam <sup>b</sup>šu-a-ti <sup>ilu</sup>Nârum u-te-ib-bi-<sup>b</sup>ba-aš-šu-ma iš-ta-al-ma-am ša e-li-šu ki-iš-bi id-du-u id-da-ak ša <sup>ilu</sup>Nâram iš-li-a-am bît mu-ub-bi-ri-šu i-tab-ba-al
šum-ma a-wi-lum i-na di-nim a-na ši-bu-ut ṣa-ar-ra-tim u-zi-a-am-ma a-wa-at iḳ-bu-u la uk-ti-in šum-ma di-nu-um <sup>b</sup>šu-u di-in na-bi-iš-tim a-wi-lum šu-u id-da-ak
šum-ma a-na ši-bu-ut VI, še’im u kaspim u-zi-a-am a-ra-an di-nim šu-a-ti it-ta-na-aš-ši

šum-ma da-a-a-nu-um di-nam i-di-in pu-ru-za-am ip-ru-uš ku-nu-uk-kam u-še-zi-ib wa-ar-ka-<sup>b</sup>nu-um-ma di-in-šu i-te-ni da-a-a-nam šu-a-ti i-na di-in <sup>b</sup>i-di-nu e-ne-im u-ka-an-nu-šu-ma ru-gu-um-ma-am ša i-na di-nim <sup>b</sup>šu-a-ti ib-ba-aš-šu-u a-du XII-šu i-na-ad-di-in u i-na pu-uḫ-<sup>b</sup>ri-im i-na <sup>iṣu</sup>kussê da-a-a-nu-ti-šu u-še-it-bu-u-šu-ma u-ul i-ta-ar-ma it-ti da-a-a-ni i-na di-nim u-ul uš-ta(=ša)-ab
šum-ma a-wi-lum ŠA.GA ilim u êkal-lim iš-ri-iḳ a-wi-lum šu-u id-da-ak u ša šu-ur-ga-am i-na ga-ti-šu im-ḫa-ru id-da-ak

šum-ma a-wi-lum lu kaspam lu ḫurâṣam lu wardam lu amtam lu alpam lu immeram lu imêram u lu mi-im-ma <sup>b</sup>šum-šu i-na ga-at <sup>b</sup>mâr a-wi-lum u lu warad a-wi-lim ba-lum ši-bi u ri-ik-sa-tim iš-ta-am u lu a-na ma-ṣa-ru-tim im-ḫu-ur a-wi-lum šu-u šar-ra-aḳ id-da-ak

šum-ma a-wi-lum lu alpam lu immeram <sup>b</sup>lu imêram lu šaḫâm u lu elippam iš-ri-iḳ šum-ma ša i-lim šum-ma ša êkallim a-du XXX-šu i-na-ad-di-in šum-ma ša MAŠ.EN.KAK a-du X-šu i-ri-a-ab šum-ma šar-ra-<sup>b</sup>ga-nu-um ša na-da-nim <sup>b</sup>la i-šu id-da-ak

šum-ma a-wi-lum VII, ša mi-im-mu-šu <sup>b</sup>hal-ḳu mi-im-ma-šu ḫal-ga-am i-na ga-ti <sup>b</sup>a-wi-lim iṣ-ṣa-ba-at a-wi-lum ša ḫu-<sup>b</sup>ul-ḳum i-na ga-ti-šu ṣa-ab-tu na-di-na-nu-um-mi <sup>b</sup>id-di-nam ma-ḫar ši-bi-mi a-ša-am iḳ-ta-bi u be-el ḫu-ul-<sup>b</sup>ḳi-im ši-bi mu-di ḫu-ul-ḳi-ia-mi lu ub-lam iḳ-ta-bi ša-a-a-ma-nu-um na-di-in id-di-nu-šum u ši-bi ša i-na maḫ-ri-<sup>b</sup>šu-nu i-ša-mu it-ba-lam u be-el ḫu-ul-<sup>b</sup>ḳi-im ši-bi mu-di <sup>b</sup>ḫu-ul-ḳi-šu it-ba-lam da-a-a-nu a-wa-a-ti-šu-nu i-im-ma-ru-ma ši-bu ša maḫ-ri-<sup>b</sup>šu-nu ši-mu-um iš-ša-mu u ši-bu mu-di ḫu-ul-ḳi-im mu-du-zu-nu ma-ḫar i-lim i-ga-ab-bu-ma na-di-na-nu-um šar-ra-aḳ id-da-ak be-el ḫu-ul-ḳi-im ḫu-lu-uḳ-šu i-li-ḳi ša-a-a-ma-nu-um i-na bi-it na-di-na-nim kaspam iš-ḳu-lu i-li-ḳi

šum-ma ša-a-a-<sup>b</sup>ma-nu-um na-di-in id-di-nu-šum u ši-bi ša i-na <sup>b</sup>maḫ-ri-šu-nu i-ša-mu la it-ba-lam be-el ḫu-ul-<sup>b</sup>ḳi-im-ma ši-bi mu-di ḫu-ul-ḳi-šu <sup>b</sup>it-ba-lam ša-a-i-ma-nu-um šar-ra-aḳ id-da-ak be-el ḫu-ul-ḳi-im ḫu-lu-uḳ-šu i-li-ḳi
šum-ma be-el <sup>b</sup>ḫu-ul-ḳi-im ši-bi mu-di ḫu-ul-ḳi-šu la it-ba-lam VIII, ṣa-ar tu-uš-ša-am-ma <sup>b</sup>id-ki id-da-ak
šum-ma na-di-<sup>b</sup>na-nu-um a-na ši-im-tim it-ta-la-ak ša-a-a-ma-nu-um i-na bi-it na-di-na-nim ru-gu-um-me-e di-nim šu-a-ti a-du V-šu i-li-ḳi

šum-ma a-wi-lum <sup>b</sup>šu-u ši-bu-šu <sup>b</sup>la kir-bu da-a-a-nu a-da-nam a-na arḫim VI<sup>kam</sup>i-ša-ak-ka-<sup>b</sup>nu-šum-ma šum-ma i-na arḫim VI<sup>kam</sup>ši-bi-šu <sup>b</sup>la ir-di-a-am a-wi-lum šu-u ṣa-ar a-ra-an di-nim <sup>b</sup>šu-a-ti it-ta-na-aš-ši
šum-ma a-wi-lum mâr a-wi-lim ṣi-iḫ-ra-am iš-ta-ri-iḳ id-da-ak
šum-ma a-wi-lum lu warad êkallim lu amat êkallim lu warad MAŠ.EN.KAK lu amat MAŠ.EN.KAK abullam uš-te-zi id-da-ak
šum-ma a-wi-lum lu wardam lu amtam ḫal-ga-am ša êkallim u lu MAŠ.EN.KAK i-na bi-ti-šu ir-ta-ki-ma a-na ši-si-it na-gi-ri-im la uš-te-zi-a-am be-el bîtim šu-u id-da-ak
šum-ma a-wi-lum lu wardam lu amtam ḫal-ga-am i-na ṣi-ri-im iṣ-ba-at-ma a-na be-li-šu ir-te-di-a-aš-šu II šiḳil kaspim be-el wardim i-na-ad-di-iš-šum
šum-ma wardum šu-u be-el-šu la iz-za-kar a-na êkallim i-ri-id-di-šu wa-ar-ka-zu ip-pa-ar-ra-aš-ma a-na be-li-šu u-ta-ar-ru-šu
šum-ma wardam šu-a-ti i-na bi-ti-šu ik-ta-la-šu wa-ar-ka wardum IX. i-na ga-ti-šu it-ta-aṣ-ba-at a-wi-lum šu-u id-da-ak
šum-ma wardum i-na ga-at ṣa-bi-ta-ni-šu iḫ-ta-li-iḳ a-wi-lum šu-u a-na be-el wardim ni-iš i-lim i-za-kar-ma u-ta-aš-šar
šum-ma a-wi-lum bi-tam ip-lu-uš i-na pa-ni bi-il-ši-im šu-a-ti i-du-uk-ku-<sup>b</sup>šu-ma i-ḫa-al-<sup>b</sup>la-lu-šu
šum-ma a-wi-lum ḫu-ub-tam iḫ-bu-ut-ma it-ta-aṣ-ba-at a-wi-lum šu-u id-da-ak

šum-ma ḫa-ab-<sup>b</sup>ba-tum la it-ta-aṣ-ba-at a-wi-lum ḫa-ab-tum mi-im-ma-šu ḫal-ga-am ma-ḫa-ar i-lim u-ba-ar-ma alum u ra-bi-a-nu-um ša i-na ir-ṣi-<sup>b</sup>ti-šu-nu u pa-di-šu-nu ḫu-ub-tum iḫ-ḫa-ab-tu mi-im-ma-šu ḫal-ga-am i-ri-a-ab-<sup>b</sup>bu-šum
šum-ma na-bi-iš-tum alum u ra-bi-<sup>b</sup>a-nu-um I ma-na kaspim a-na ni-ši-šu i-ša-ga-lu

šum-ma i-na bît <sup>b</sup>a-wi-lim i-ša-tum in-na-bi-iḫ-ma a-wi-lum ša a-na bu-ul-<sup>b</sup>li-im il-li-ku a-na nu-ma-at be-el bîtim i-in-šu iš-ši-ma nu-ma-at be-el bîtim il-te-di(=ḳi) a-wi-lum šu-u a-na i-ša-tim <sup>b</sup>šu-a-ti in-na-ad-di

šum-ma lu rid ṣâbê u lu bâ’irum ša a-na ḫar-ra-an <sup>b</sup>šar-ri-im a-la-ak-šu X, ga-bu-u la il-li-ik u lu <sup>amêlu</sup>agram i-gur-ma pu-uḫ-šu id-da-ra-ad lu rid ṣâbê u lu bâ’irum šu-u id-da-ak mu-na-ag-gi-<sup>b</sup>ir-šu bî-zu i-tab-ba-al

šum-ma lu rid ṣâbê u lu-u bâ’irum ša i-na dan-na-at šar-ri-im tu-ur-ru wa-ar-[ki]-šu eḳil-šu u kirâ-šu a-na ša-ni-im id-di-nu-ma i-li-ik-šu it-ta-la-ak šum-ma it-tu-<sup>b</sup>ra-am-ma ali-šu <sup>b</sup>ik-ta-aš-dam eḳil-šu u kirâ-šu u-ta-ar-<sup>b</sup>ru-šum-ma šu-ma i-li-ik-šu i-il-la-ak
šum-ma lu rid ṣâbê u lu-u bâ’irum ša i-na dan-na-at šar-ri-im tu-ur-ru mâr-šu il-kam a-la-kam i-li-i eḳlum u kirûm in-na-ad-di-<sup>b</sup>iš-šum-ma i-li-[ik] a-bi-šu i-il-la-ak
šum-ma mâr-šu ṣi-ḫi-ir-ma i-li-ik a-bi-šu a-la-kam la i-li-i ša-lu-uš-ti <sup>b</sup>eḳlim u kirêm a-na um-mi-šu in-na-ad-di-<sup>b</sup>in-ma um-ma-šu u-ra-ab-ba-šu

šum-ma lu rid ṣâbê u lu bâ’irum eḳil-šu kirâ-šu <sup>b</sup>u bî-zu i-na pa-ni <sup>b</sup>il-ki-im id-di-ma ud-da-ab-bi-ir ša-nu-um wa-ar-ki-šu eḳil-šu <sup>b</sup>kirâ-šu u bî-zu iṣ-ba-at-ma šattam III<sup>kam</sup>i-li-ik-šu it-ta-la-ak šum-ma it-tu-<sup>b</sup>ra-am-ma eḳil-šu kirâ-šu u bî-zu i-ir-ri-iš u-ul in-na-ad-<sup>b</sup>di-iš-šum XI, ša iṣ-ṣa-ab-<sup>b</sup>tu-ma i-li-ik-šu it-ta-al-ku šu-ma <sup>b</sup>i-il-la-ak
šum-ma ša-at-tam iš-ti-a-at-ma ud-da-ab-<sup>b</sup>bi-ir-ma it-tu-ra-am eḳil-šu kirû-šu <sup>b</sup>u bî-zu in-na-ad-di-<sup>b</sup>iš-šum-ma šu-ma i-li-ik-šu i-il-la-ak

šum-ma lu rid ṣâbê u lu bâ’iram ša i-na ḫar-ra-an šar-ri-im tu-ur-ru tam-karum ip-tu-<sup>b</sup>ra-aš-šu-ma ali-šu uš-ta-ak-<sup>b</sup>ši-da-aš-šu šum-ma i-na bi-ti-šu ša pa-da-ri-im i-ba-aš-ši šu-ma ra-ma-an-šu i-pa-ad-da-ar šum-ma i-na bi-ti-šu ša pa-da-ri-šu la i-ba-aš-ši i-na bît ili ali-šu ip-pa-ad-dar šum-ma i-na bît ili ali-šu ša pa-da-ri-šu la i-ba-aš-ši êkallum i-pa-<sup>b</sup>ad-da-ri(=ar)-šu eḳil-šu kirû-šu u bî-zu a-na ip-te-ri-šu u-ul in-na-<sup>b</sup>ad-di-in
šum-ma lu PA.PA u lu-u NU.TUR ṣâb ni-is-ḫa-tim ir-ta-ši u lu a-na ḫarrân šar-ri-im <sup>amêlu</sup>agram pu-ḫa-am im-hu-ur-ma ir-te-di lu PA.PA u lu NU.TUR šu-u id-da-ak

šum-ma lu PA.PA u lu NU.TUR nu-ma-at rid ṣâbê <sup>b</sup>il-te-ḳi rid ṣâbê iḫ-ta-<sup>b</sup>ba-al rid ṣâbê a-na ig-ri-im it-ta-di-in rid ṣâbê i-na di-nim a-na dan-nim iš-ta-ra-aḳ ḳi-iš-ti šar-ru-um [a]-na rid ṣâbê id-di-nu il-te-di(=ḳi) lu PA.PA u lu NU.TUR šu-u id-da-ak
šum-ma a-wi-lum LID.GUD.ZUN u ṣênê ša šar-ru-um a-na rid ṣâbê id-di-nu XII, i-na ga-ti rid ṣâbê iš-ta-am i-na kaspi-šu i-te-el-li
eḳlu-um kirûm <sup>b</sup>u bîtum ša rid ṣâbê bâ’irim u na-ši <sup>b</sup>bi-il-tim a-na kaspim u-ul i-na-ad-<sup>b</sup>di-in
